attributes.action: To allow the the same laws that govern dog owners to be used against cats and their owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in this country dog owners have responsibility over their dogs and can be prosicuted over unlawful acts by their dog i asked that these same laws are used against all pets regardless to breed or type particularly cats that interfere by creating mess on other peoples property and the owners should be made to clean this up as well as the dog owners should. The law should be tightened up and pet licenses should be introduced for all pet owners.
